Articles.Content:
So I notice in 0.24.2 the monolith near the KSP is flush with the ground, whereas in 0.23.5 it was floating off the ground, you could walk under it.

You can also walk right through it. I can't remember, could you walk through the monoliths in 0.23.5? The one near KSC2 (ruins) was flush with the ground, so I think I would have noticed if you could walk right through it, but maybe I just never tried.
I'm pretty sure you could have always walked right through it.
I posted a screenshot of this on Steam (I have Steam version).

I posted a screenshot of this on Steam (I have Steam version).

Perhaps you could provide a link?
All monoliths except the ones on the Mun can be walked through, but the KSC one being on the ground... that's new. I guess it finally ran out of energy to keep hovering....
